reasoning: Smoldering myeloma is a precursor condition to symptomatic multiple myeloma with poorly defined incidence. Estimated ~1.5 per 100k based on smoldering MM representing 10-20% of plasma cell dyscrasias in population-based studies, though most cancer registries do not separately track smoldering vs symptomatic MM.
source: Rajkumar SV et al. (2014). International Myeloma Working Group updated criteria for the diagnosis of multiple myeloma. Lancet Oncol. 15(12):e538-e548
